## ExposedPii type

Type alias that exposes the decrypted or obfuscated value of [PII](./paramodel.piistring.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ExposedPii<T> = (T extends PiiString ? string : T extends Array<infer E> ? Array<ExposedPii<E>> : T extends Record<string, any> ? {
    [K in keyof T]: ExposedPii<T[K]>;
} : T);
```
